00015 
00019 int power (int y, unsigned int x) {
00020     int result = 1;
00021     while(x-- > 0) result *= y;
00022     return result;
00023 }
00024 
00025 
00033 MultidimensionalLookupTable::MultidimensionalLookupTable (int observations, 
00034                                                           int outputs, 
00035                                                           int maxHistory) 
00036 {
00037     
00038     assert(maxHistory > 0);
00039     
00040     this->observations = observations;
00041     actions = outputs;
00042     this->maxHistory = maxHistory;
00043     
00044     params.resize (outputs,  power (observations, maxHistory)); params.clear();
00045     trace.resize (outputs, power (observations, maxHistory)); trace.clear();
00046     grads.resize (outputs, power (observations, maxHistory)); grads.clear();
00047 }
00048

00050 void MultidimensionalLookupTable::doApprox (Observation& obs, Vector& output) {
00051     
00052     assert(obs.getFeatures().size1() == (size_t)maxHistory);
00053     assert(obs.getFeatures().size2() == 1);
00054     
00055     int index = 0;
00056     for (int i = maxHistory-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00057         index = index*observations + (int)obs.getFeatures()(i, obs.getAgent());
00058     }
00059     assert (index < power(observations, maxHistory));
00060     
00061     output = column (params, index);
00062     
00063 }
00064 
00065 void MultidimensionalLookupTable::feedbackGrad (Observation& obs, Vector& deltas) {
00066     
00067     int index = 0;
00068     for (int i = maxHistory-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00069         index = index*observations + (int)obs.getFeatures()(i, obs.getAgent());
00070     }
00071     assert (index < power(observations, maxHistory));
00072     column(trace, index) += deltas;
00073 }

00080 int MultidimensionalLookupTable::getInputDim() { return maxHistory; }
